introduce_product: The face of this 200-meter water resistant BABY-G model features eye-catching vivid color. An ion-plated metal ring combines with a face protector to create a face that is dynamic, yet classic BABY-G.

list_spec_icon.detail_spec_icon: World Time for 31 time zones (48 cities + UTC), city code display, daylight saving on/off

list_specification_product:
25pg Databank
Memory capacity: Up to 25 sets of data, each set including;
Name (8 characters) and telephone number (12 digits)
Other: Auto-sort

World Time 
29 time zones (30 cities), city code display, daylight saving on/off

Day Counter
Automatically counts down the days from the current date to a target date.
Memory capacity: 5 records (8 characters each)

1/100 second stopwatch
Measuring capacity: 23:59'59.99"
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times

Countdown Timer
Measuring Unit: 1-second
Input Range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and 1-hour increments)
Full Auto Calendar (pre-programmed until the year 2099)

Battery: CR1616
Approx. battery life: 3 years
